item.title: About
item.description: Hello Hello, I’m Ian! My day job involves me creating great medical imaging solutions in Java and my evenings are spent across a multitude of activities and personal projects. Current Interests I like spending my free time working on personal software projects, learning new technologies, playing video games, building robots, finding new restaurants, and several other categories of awesome. Current passions include learning enough about the National Electric Code to do some minor rewiring bits and pieces on my house, wrestling with yard work, and trying to brew the perfect cup of coffee.
